topic.title: New Publication: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1969–1976, Volume XXII, Panama, 1973–1976
topic.body: The volume documents the Panama Canal treaty negotiations from January 1973 until December of 1976, focusing on Ellsworth Bunker’s efforts to create a series of threshold agreements with the Panamanians based loosely on the Kissinger-Tack Principles of 1974.
